summary.span: 包含支持矩阵/透视转换的类型。

span.span: Contains types that support matrix/perspective transformation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此命名空间文档包含仅.NET 投影的投影的 WinRT 类型与不同的 Windows 运行时 (WinRT) 类型。This namespace documentation contains only .NET projections of Windows Runtime (WinRT) types where the projection differs from the WinRT type. 若要查看此命名空间类型的完整列表，请参阅[Windows.UI.Xaml.Media.Media3D](https://docs.microsoft.com/uwp/api/windows.ui.xaml.media.media3d) UWP API 参考。To see the complete list of types for this namespace, see [Windows.UI.Xaml.Media.Media3D](https://docs.microsoft.com/uwp/api/windows.ui.xaml.media.media3d) in the UWP API reference.
